ai_page.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Lincolnshire - Page
ai_page.body:
It looks like the "HTML" you provided is actually a portion of a PDF file (it begins with `%PDF-1.6` and includes binary-like streams). There is no usable HTML structure here to extract any main body content from.

**What happened:**  
You requested semantic HTML extraction from "the full HTML source of a web page," but the input you provided is PDF data, not HTML.

**What to do:**  
- Please provide the complete HTML source of the web page (the content you'd see if you viewed source in your browser).
- Make sure the content starts with something like `<!DOCTYPE html>` or `<html>`, and contains web markup, not PDF or binary data.

**Once you provide valid HTML**, I can extract and return the clean, semantically structured HTML with just the central editorial content as requested.
